website_summaries.verdict: A portable yet powerful space heater with safety features that will add to your peace of mind.
pros: Heats up quickly and provides adequate warmth for small to large rooms
Portable but has a sturdy build
Overheat protection and auto shutoff if tipped over
cons: Air output is quite forceful and may be annoying to some users

customer_reviews.title: Great heater!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Quiet and puts off a lot of heat and if it gets tipped it automatically shuts off. I will be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater.
customer_reviews.text: It puts out a lot of heat. It is compact and does not take up too much rooms. The design makes it very stable also. It also has tip over protection, which is great because I have dogs and cats.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Bass

customer_reviews.title: Knob difficult to turn, otherwise nice item!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small unit. We decided to give it a try instead of purchasing another Lasko unit. (We already have a Lasko unit that we use for another room). This Bojing unit is cheaper but despite the same wattage, the Lasko unit does seem to heat the room up faster. Don't let that be the deciding factor. This unit is very lightweight, easy to move around and great value for the money. However, the knob used for selecting the heating option is difficult to turn. That is the only setback in our opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Money saving
customer_reviews.text: Space heaters really tun ip electric bills! I think this one will help as it pnly comes on when yhe room trmp gets low, and is easy to reset. I DO have to plug it into a surge protector, as no wall ug close enough, but it is only used when I am near it. So far, am really liking this.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia Vickers Trimble

customer_reviews.title: Gives lots of heat for small unit
customer_reviews.text: Gives a lot of heat. Easily heats a 200 - 300 square foot area. I had hoped it would be extra quiet, but it is as noisy as any other heater, excepts it works better. May buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: purplelady

customer_reviews.title: Nice little heater
customer_reviews.text: Nice little heater for the price. It’s difficult to turn the knobs though. On and off should be easier. My mom uses this and she is older and finds it difficult to turn it on and off. The heat is amazing. She doesn’t even use the highest heat setting because it’s actually too hot to sit in front of. But great to heat up a room. She uses the medium heat setting and she loves sitting like 4-5 feet from it blowing on her legs or lower body. The cool setting will be great in summer.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elwell

customer_reviews.title: Best Portable Heater- Very easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Bojing Ceramic Portable heater is very easy to carry from one place to another. It’s very light weight, I could move it around easily. It has feature to adjust the thermostat to 3 modes which include cool wind, low and high heat. Along with that it has adjustable thermostat controller. I like it’s safety feature. It has tip-over safety switch which will turn off the heater in case it falls down. It has button to switch from auto oscillation diffused mode which will cover 70% of the area to focused mode.It has a fan mode which I can use in summer. Overall, I am very happy with my purchase since I can use this heater in winter and summer both.
customer_reviews.author: Khushbu

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice.. Heats the room without issues
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Small in size but big in action. I used it mainly for my son’s room as it always colder than the rest of the house. This heater warmed the room without any issues, and it turns off automatically when the desired temperature is reached, and turns back on when the room gets colder. The tip off security feature is a plus. The only downside is there is no way to set to the desired temperature without using a thermostat, but it’s not a big issue because once yo set it you don’t need to change it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heats up great
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected but puts out the heat!! I love this heater, works great at work because noise level is very minimal! Not totally quiet but will not disturb anyone in a cubicle environment. I love the oscillating feature, other heaters point in one direction, gets to hot in one area and have to keep moving it around. Small enough for top or under desk.
customer_reviews.author: NSL

customer_reviews.title: Surprising Little Powerhouse!
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and was immediately skeptical that this little machine would be able to handle the job of keeping my sons room warm. I turned it on and was surprised how quiet it was. I walked out of the cold room and was shocked at how warm it was when I returned 15min later. Wow!!! What a great buy. I highly recommend!!!!!!!! Things I like best about this tiny champ: Compact light weight Easy set up Quickly warms up the room Temperature control settings Very safe to use
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M.

customer_reviews.title: heater
customer_reviews.text: It really surprise me, tucked it out of box looked small but try it works real good for living puts out hot heat and good price.
customer_reviews.author: jesse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little heater
customer_reviews.text: Despite it's small size, it heats up a room surprisingly well. The oscillating feature definitely helps spread the warmth throughout a room. The controls are very simple (2 dials: one for fan mode, one for temperature; and one button to toggle the turning feature). One minor complaint (doesn't affect my rating though) is that it was a tad louder than I expected. It doesn't bother me much since I usually have headphones on, but it might bother some who prefer complete or near silence. If you want a small heater that can heat up a room in around 20 minutes, this little guy is for you.
customer_reviews.author: TeaLeaf

customer_reviews.title: REAL HEAT !!
customer_reviews.text: Will Really Warm Up The Place ! I Love It Since My Room Is Always Cold Whether The Central Air Is On Or Not So Thats A Pro . Only thing is the noise sounds like a drive on a empty highway. It doesnt bother me but I know it might for some.
customer_reviews.author: katisha

customer_reviews.title: Fans are cheap quality and have short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: About 2 weeks in the oscillator began making horrible Halloween noises. Turning off oscillation fixed. Another 2 weeks go by and the circulation fan starts making the sounds of a dying turkey. Not worth replacing again this soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: works well!** not so much
customer_reviews.text: Warms up fast and is aesthetically pleasing. My only warning for buyers is if you have dexterity problems the power and heat dial is a bit difficult to turn. ***Update*** Returned, heater began to emit a loud noise off and on after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: linsey

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This heater is being used as a supplement for a bathroom in a studio. It shuts off when not needed and turns back on by itself. I am pleased with the output for my small space. We have long winters (Oct.-June) so it is much needed.
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: Good but difficult to turn knobs
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heater but difficult to turn on. The knob is flush with the top so very hard to grasp. Especially if you have arthritis, fingernails or big hands. I leave it to “on” position all the time and just plug or unplug, which is not safe. So what I do is, I tilt the heater on its side, which cuts the power before I plug or unplug. Wish the knobs stuck out. Overall good heater for after showering.
customer_reviews.author: Amika

customer_reviews.title: Heats well but not quiet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was small and the ad said quiet. It heats an 8 x 10 room or smaller well for the size. But quiet it is not!! After listening for awhile i guess the sound blends in but i thought it would be much quieter.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Not a great design
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work well enough but it doesn't throw a ton of heat like I had hoped for. The big problem is the controls. They are recessed into the top and very difficult to turn. It's ok but not a great design.
customer_reviews.author: Justa Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but it my circuit breaker thrice
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine January 2020. It looked great and I loved how all the switches are to be used with it so that I can set it with my smart plug. The bad part is that it tripped my circuit break at least 3x today. I hope it’s just a defective item as I’m returning it tomorrow and requested for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: ML M.

customer_reviews.title: Great small room heater
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for the laundry room in the basement. Being in Chicago it gets a little cold and I wanted to give my dog a bath. We use the heater in a small office room and basement. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: SIU

customer_reviews.title: Product began smoking
customer_reviews.text: The heater began smelling burnt after a month or so of use (8 hours a day, 2-3 days a week). I caved and invested in a nicer heater after this. Was great until then
customer_reviews.author: Julia M.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within first month
customer_reviews.text: Loved this heater, so efficient to heat an enclosed room in short amount of time. Unfortunately, after a few short weeks the heater started producing a high pitched tone each time I turned it on. I'd turn it off for 30 min reset,a s recommended on the unit, but the same thing happened each time. When left on to see if tone would stop, it not only continued but began producing a burning smell. Currently seeking refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Unit
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but powerful. Control knobs are a little hard to turn. Seems flimsy. But overall I'm satisfied. I'm just going to leave it on a comfortable setting.
customer_reviews.author: GGO

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product but I wish I had bought one with a thermostat. This one adjusts, but there is just a knob and no way to set it at a numerical setting.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Heater & Made Well, Too!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful well made heater for my bathroom! Small but mighty! This heats up my small bathroom right away and makes the room nice and toasty! It is well made and I would definitely buy again. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Coates

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!! Warms up my office quickly and my clients are happy. The only drawback is, it’s kinda loud. It’s not terrible but you will definitely notice it. I would still recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Payslee

customer_reviews.title: A Cute Little Heater
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it a 5-star. What happened was one night, it shuts down on its own, and I couldn't start it back on, and this is not because of overuse or overheating. After fiddling around a bit with the plug, it came back up. I never understood what happened.
customer_reviews.author: lnyl22

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Design, Too Costly For Product
customer_reviews.text: Heat gauge is not accurate, cannot set gauge as there is no markings at all, NOT quiet at all, too costly. Go with the Lasko
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Very small but puts out the heat
customer_reviews.text: This is a small and attractive heater that works well and has a very reasonable price. What more do you want?
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Konrad

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Great product - Instructions appear to have be written in language other than English. Control knob is a little hard to turn but throws out a great deal of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Packs quite a lot of function into a small heater.
customer_reviews.text: Has quite a lot of features compared to my last space heater. Feels well constructed and function as advertised. Hope it last longer than my last one.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Very portable and a lot of heat
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could put in what temperature I would like and it automatically turns off. My last heater I had I could do that with, but my office we move this heater around. It works great and puts out a lot of heat for its size. We have a name for it R2heat2. Best money i have spent on a heater for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia Meling

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: Brought two and one works an then doesnt work just after 30 days. Back and forth....NOT Fair
customer_reviews.author: Classic Consigns by KYS

customer_reviews.title: Great for bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the winter. The heater is small but it heats up the room rather quickly and not loud or noisy. Simple mechanics and easy to adjust the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Button broken in 30 days
customer_reviews.text: Button to control oscillation is broken and it won’t turn off, poor design. Makes odd grinding noise when turning, returning!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Boring

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Very small unit and super quiet. Will easily warm up a small bedroom or office.
customer_reviews.author: YoungTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater 4/7/20
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Heats a large bedroom and bathroom simultaneously. Doesn’t have a filter though. So keep you floor vacuumed and clean.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES F. WALKER JR.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This little guy really can put out some heat. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rose648

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic Portable Indoor Space Heater
customer_reviews.text: The indoor space heater continues to work and sometimes I use it as a white noise device.
customer_reviews.author: RJWilson

customer_reviews.title: Clanky cheap plastic that has fragil and weak inside components that leads to being easily broken.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super light and feel clanky and made of cheap plastic. Literally looks perfect, but broker within a few days and the simple Reset rules simply haven't worked...at all... DO NOT BUY THIS. NO BUENO
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works well for warming up small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Great price and pushes out a lot of heat for small places like a bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good heat output, however when oscillating it make a squeaking noise
customer_reviews.author: Jesse James H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for around the house or office.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this produce. It is so small yet does exactly what I wanted. I use it under my work table and it keeps my feet warm as well as warming the immediate area of the room. There is a tipover switch so it is safe. The outside of the unit does not get hot so safe for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Joy S. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Money!
customer_reviews.text: This heater lasted barely over a month. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: DENISE EBERLINE

customer_reviews.title: Burnt out after one month
customer_reviews.text: Avoid! After just over a month, it burnt out and stopped working after moderate use. Too late to return it for being defective.
customer_reviews.author: Sachmo321

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my office at work because it gets very cold. It is perfect right underneath my desk, not too loud, and if accidentally knocked over it turns off. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephk

customer_reviews.title: Great Heater
customer_reviews.text: Great heater! Only issue is if you have nails (not really long) the knobs are hard to turn as they are not level with the top of the heater.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Good little space heater
customer_reviews.text: Tried other models that fell apart in weeks. This does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: C.A C.

customer_reviews.title: An average little heater
customer_reviews.text: We have all owned quite a few small electric heaters. This one falls somewhere in the middle. Better than some but not a great unit. I use it at work on cold days under my desk. It's a fair little heater
customer_reviews.author: Scott Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My elderly dad loves it. It sits near him and works great. Saves from running the heater
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Messina

customer_reviews.title: Cute and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo tiny and sooooo powerful! It warms up my entire room within minutes! It’s stylish and it works waaaay better than I was expecting. Definitely recommending to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Melina Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is a small but great heater. We have had it for almost a year now and had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew George

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect add for a large room with one forced hot air heat register. Has auto shut off for tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the Heater!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a small fan makes a loud noise like a tank! Maybe just this unit I received? The Heater appeared to be someone’s returned item... There’re visible marks and stains!!!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Works Great  for Small Bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Heats up a space very quicky! The knobs are a little hard to adjust, but not a big deal. Its compact and effective.
customer_reviews.author: L.A. Buyer

customer_reviews.title: decent product
customer_reviews.text: Overall it works okay. It is small which is what I needed. I am having issues with the placement of it. I liked that it had a fan component but I don't think that works as well as when it is on heat mode. As a heater it is pretty good for my small office space.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get hot
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't put out much heat and the photo is deceiving doesn't get close to red hot.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Too small for price, but does what it's intended for.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, way too small. Was looking for a mid size heater to heat my apartment living room. knobs for temperature control are hard to turn and markings for levels are hard to see. I will say the rotation is nice and it does the job, (I had to sit on a stool for height).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small yet powerful
customer_reviews.text: Are use it to heat up my she shed in the winter time works perfectly... It’s small yet powerful
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this since Feb 1 and it just went out this am and smells like fire
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Knobs
customer_reviews.text: The knobs are awkward and hard to turn! I sent it back because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Shatlock

customer_reviews.title: Heater died out
customer_reviews.text: The heater was quiet and worked well initially. Then died in less than a week, with minimal run time.
customer_reviews.author: Chica_Bonita

customer_reviews.title: We see no problem in using it in the bathroom. No chance of shock from use if common sense is used.
customer_reviews.text: Meets all our expectations. Instant heat. Nice and quiet. Does not take up much space.Very nice design. The only reason that we do not give full 5 stars is that the controls are a bit "stiff" to rotate.
customer_reviews.author: RalphE

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a super convenient and safe space heater. I bought it for my daughter's room because it is the coldest room in the house regardless of the heat being on. It shuts itself off once the room reaches the desired temp. I love it! It has worked like a charm
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: My room is about 150 ft square and this warm up the room really really well! Definitely recommend if you need a one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Great heater.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome heater. Warmed up fast and kept me very warm. Not too big and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: upslynn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for long!
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a few weeks. Now stays on for about 3 Minutes and shuts off. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Aswesome space heater! The best of the best!
customer_reviews.text: This space heater save my life and ny cats during tough winter.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Recommended space heater
customer_reviews.text: Very nice space heater with safety switch, ideal for a small space
customer_reviews.author: Horace Pizzarello

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm, quiet too
customer_reviews.text: Great little heater! I use it for about 550-60 sq ft basement keep it in the low setting and it works great. Keeps area around 69-70 degree f. My little pug loves it, lays in front of it all the time! Good buy as long as quality assurance is on point from factory.
customer_reviews.author: phillip stewart

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work out the box
customer_reviews.text: Literally took it out of the box 20 min ago, my room smells like burning chemicals and this thing was cooler than my laptop when it charges. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Luis A

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: Heater now makes load noise when heater initially turns on. Smelled burning plastic in my 3 month old daughters room . Only had this for 1 month and now have to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Madrox56

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working shortly after product support window closed
customer_reviews.text: This heater worked very good up until the 6 month product support window closed, I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt what I expected, didnt heat the room at all
customer_reviews.author: Latonya Perkins-Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Heats up a big room!
customer_reviews.text: It was better than the other round heater we had this actually pushes the hot air out and you can feel it in the room. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: vera ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: A Fantastic little heater
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about getting this heater at first but it works very well for this size. Compared to my Lasko heater, this tiny heater warmed up my apartment in 15 min. I was absolutely amazed. I'm going to buy another one for office use.
customer_reviews.author: Will Chang

customer_reviews.title: Best small heater ever—and I’ve tried a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Best heater ever! Small. Quiet. Warms me up nice and toasty on low setting. 😍
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ann Haddock

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I bought and glad I did because this heater is awesome! Tiny and heats up a room super fast. Compact and lightweight and great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Laryssa M Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Heats up 10x12 kitchen
customer_reviews.text: The knobs are recessed nd a bit hard to turn. It does heat my kitchen and I like that the fan pins
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heats up great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any room! Heats up my sons room fast. Quiet too!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Good for heating a small office
customer_reviews.text: It's much better than I thought. Our office cannot support high power appliance. This heater is perfect for me to use in my office. Warm wind comes out immediately without any delay. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: PENGJU CHEN

customer_reviews.title: GET THE PLIERS
customer_reviews.text: Unable to turn temperature control by hand. Have to use pliers to turn on and off. Otherwise, a good room heater.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good heater
customer_reviews.text: It was working great until yesterday, everytime I turn it on it makes a loud screeching sound I hope I can fix it but right now I have to put it off to the side and hope customer help comes through
customer_reviews.author: kristan longid

customer_reviews.title: Restful sleep
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing ,Heats my room fast and it stays nice and cozy
customer_reviews.author: Scott Moore

customer_reviews.title: Bought for cold office at work
customer_reviews.text: Shut off first day for overheating, would stay on if I left rotate off. Died the big death after minimal office use after 3 months. Waste of $
customer_reviews.author: philip r.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Space Heater!
customer_reviews.text: This little portable heater is a gem! I was delighted at how effective and efficient it heats small rooms and makes them toasty in record time!
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little heater, using in my 10X10 office and it works great, heats the room quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great heat but terrible control knob
customer_reviews.text: This heater puts out great heat. That being said the switch to turn it on and off is HORRIBLE; it’s stiff and not skin friendly. Poor design.
customer_reviews.author: D. Frey

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: To small and not quite at all I made a mistake love and learn
customer_reviews.author: Dew

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this heater! Safe and easy to use! This is so versatile and works so much better than I expected! It heats up 2 to 3 small rooms when put in the hallway 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻
customer_reviews.author: Wendy McHenry

customer_reviews.title: Lasted Four Months and Burned Up!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for four months. I had it on the low heat setting always - never went above that. Just burned up today after less than 4 months of use. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best for the price. Keeps me nice and warm at nights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT like the knobs
customer_reviews.text: The knobs are very hard to operate, it feel like they are going to brake anytime, also , they are hard to see and set them up properly
customer_reviews.author: aldocampodonico

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the purchase in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay at first. Not even a year old and it is no longer working, no warranty was offered doesn’t even work in fan setting.
customer_reviews.author: Camillia

customer_reviews.title: Valuable heater
customer_reviews.text: This heat is very convenience, easy to use and carry, reasonable price, keep warm when you cold.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Room Heater
customer_reviews.text: Very Good & perfect For 200 Sq Feet Room I like it .
customer_reviews.author: DHAVALKUMAR  JANI

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER 8 WEEKS
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working 2 weeks after return timeframe. Controls hard to use. Reviews are all over the place; appears product quality is inconsistent. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Johnson Cheek

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: I need to purchase more its a great product and a great price
customer_reviews.author: Mike Booritch

customer_reviews.title: Very loud after 5 days!
customer_reviews.text: It was great for 5 days and then it started making a loud annoying noise when using the oscillating mode. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

product_meta.title: Bojing 1500W/950W Ceramic Portable Indoor Space Heater, Electric Quiet Oscillating Fan Heater for Home and Office with Thermostat
product_meta.description:
Bojing Oscillating Electric Ceramic Heater

- 2 heating levels: Low (950W)/ High (1500W)
- 3 quiet settings: Fan/ Low (950W)/ High (1500W)
- 70° wide heating coverage
- Fully adjustable thermostat
- Overheat protection
- Automatic shutdown in case of fall over
- Heat resistant plastic housing made up with V0 flame retardant material
- Voltage/Frequency: 110-120V, 50/60Hz
feature_bullets: ✔ 2 SECONDS SPEED HEAT UP - 1500W/950W High/Low power PTC ceramic heater element with powerful fan, it will heat up instantly for warming up an area in your home and office. This space heater is perfect for your entertainment and work space & keep feet and legs warm under the desk. Also, it can be used on the desk to warm hands when you using the mouse and keyboard. No longer feeling cold in this winter!

✔ 3 QUIET SETTINGS with ADJUSTABLE THERMOSTAT - Including high heat (1500W), low heat (950W) with adjustable thermostat and nature wind. These 3 settings make this electric space heater ideal for warming up an area in your home and office. Combined with different heating levels with adjustable thermostat, this space heater can always meets your daily heating needed!
